cellularland1

Class ManaController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cellularland1.ManaController

  • public final class ManaController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller of the mana bar. The behavior of the bar is specified in the constants Capacity, Speed, AutoStopSpeed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManaController(javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar pb) 

    • Method Summary

      Cell was clicked - check if mana is sufficient, what to do and does it.

      void recalibrate(int direction, double fullness)
      Recalibrates the timeline so that the progress bar runs with the same speed as before changing the value of points.
      void reset()
      Reset the mana bar, set the points to zero.
      boolean restartAuto()
      The player wants to restart the automaton - the mana in empty afterwards.
      void stop() 
      void stopAuto(javafx.animation.Timeline timelineMain)
      Used when player stops the automaton, reverses the flow of mana with specified speed.

    • Method Detail

      • isStopped

        public boolean isStopped()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the mana bar, set the points to zero.

      • restartAuto

        public boolean restartAuto()
        The player wants to restart the automaton - the mana in empty afterwards.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the restarting was successful (whether there is enough mana. If true, the action should be passed to mechanics.

      • cellClick

        public boolean cellClick(ButtonNode b)
        Cell was clicked - check if mana is sufficient, what to do and does it. also changes the state of the button.
        Parameters:
        b - The button that was clicked
        Returns:
        Returns if the action was successful. If true, than the action should be passed on to game mechanics.

      • stopAuto

        public void stopAuto(javafx.animation.Timeline timelineMain)
        Used when player stops the automaton, reverses the flow of mana with specified speed.

      • recalibrate

        public void recalibrate(int direction,
                        double fullness)
        Recalibrates the timeline so that the progress bar runs with the same speed as before changing the value of points.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction the it should run (1=up, -1=down)
        fullness - How full the bar is now.

      • stop

        public void stop()
